sentences.en: As a young child , she often recite line from the ancient ode.
sentences.cn: 小时候她经常背诵古赋里的辞句.

sentences.en: He can recite Shelly's Ode to the West Wind.
sentences.cn: 他能背诵雪莱的 “ 西风颂”.

sentences.en: He favorite song was called " Ode to Beijing "
sentences.cn: 她最喜欢的歌是 “ 北京颂歌”

sentences.en: His much - praised'Harvard Commemoration Ode'is too graceful, too felicitous through too many lines.
sentences.cn: 他那首大受赞扬的《哈佛纪念会上朗诵的颂歌》,过分典雅,措词过于巧妙, 也写得太长了些.

sentences.en: If Winter comes, can Spring be far behind? 　　　　　—— < Ode to the West Wind > 　　　　—— Percy Bysshe Shelley ( 1792 - 1822 )
sentences.cn: 如果冬天来了, 春天还会远 吗 ?出自《西风颂》作者:雪莱 ( 1792——1822 )

sentences.en: Method Human cardiovascular system model is used to simulate acute hemorrhage with ODE 45 algorithm.
sentences.cn: 方法利用包含多种心血管反射的血流动力学模型,采用ODE45可变步长算法模拟急性失血.
希腊古瓮之歌((济慈(Keats)的诗)).

sentences.en: ODE'S , PDE's, and Boundary Conditions . Well - posedness.
sentences.cn: 常微分方程的数值方法, 离散稳定性.

sentences.en: The chorus was singing 'The Ode to Joy'.
The chorus was singing "The Ode to Joy".
The poem is entitled Ode to Skylark.
sentences.cn: 这首诗的题目是《云雀颂》.

sentences.en: The recitation of a ballad, an ode, etc.
sentences.cn: 叙事歌谣 、 颂诗等的背诵.
